title: Part 140 - Civil Actions Or Proceedings Brought By Inmates
content:
Part 140 - Civil Actions Or Proceedings Brought By Inmates

State Regulations
§ 140.1 - General
§ 140.2 - Application
§ 140.3 - Disposition of motion
§ 140.4 - Special procedure where fee is collected from a source other than an incarcerated person's trust fund account

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
